pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Decade (2009, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft Decade's $(l:decade/items/k_touch)Final Kamen Terminal K-Touch$(/l)$(br2)Can be used to summon $(l:den_o/riders/den_o#liner)Kamen Rider Den-O Liner Form$(/l) when right-clicked as $(l:decade/riders/decade#complete)Kamen Rider Decade Complete Form$(/l)
